thread.title: Holly
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Holly

author: Holly
title: Holly
text: I'm new to vaping, and while doing some research I found the Boundless CFC portable vaporizer online. It is a great price point for my first purchase and it turned out to be a really good quality product. The fast shipping and extra free gifts were an added bonus. I would definitely recommend to anyone!
